Sentencas: This work uses the mathematical model of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine (IT-SOFC/GT) hybrid system to study the effects of gasified biomass fuels on system load characteristics.
Titulo: Effect of gasified biomass fuel on load characteristics of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The system performance is investigated by using four types of fuels in each adjusting mode.
Titulo: Effect of gasified biomass fuel on load characteristics of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The relation between the fuel type and load adjusting mode is obtained for users and designers to select the appropriate fuel for reasonable operation modes.
Titulo: Effect of gasified biomass fuel on load characteristics of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Results show that the hybrid system of 182.4 kW has a high electric efficiency of 60.78% by using wood chip gas (WCG).
Titulo: Effect of gasified biomass fuel on load characteristics of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: If cotton wood gas (CWG) and corn stalk gas (CSG) are used, both boundary values of steam to carbon ratio (S/C-bv) and system power are higher, but system efficiencies decrease to 57.36% and 57.87% respectively.
Titulo: Effect of gasified biomass fuel on load characteristics of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: In the designed three load adjusting modes, the system can reach maximum efficiency over 59% with four types of biomass gases.
Titulo: Effect of gasified biomass fuel on load characteristics of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: If high efficiency and a wide range of load adjustment are required, users can select Case B to use fuels like WCG and GSG.
Titulo: Effect of gasified biomass fuel on load characteristics of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: When higher efficiency and low load is expected, Case A is more desirable.
Titulo: Effect of gasified biomass fuel on load characteristics of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: With fuels like CWG and CSG, the system has good safety performance in Case C. (C) 2016
Titulo: Effect of gasified biomass fuel on load characteristics of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system
